summary: usain bolt will compete at the iaaf/btc world relays in the bahamas . the six-time olympic gold medallist will compete at the relay championship on may 2 and 3 as part of the jamaican team . 'i'm happy to be part of the jamaican team for the iaaf / btc world relays in the bahamas. i am fit, healthy and ready to run,' said bolt .
